description: This Dart source file defines an AccountProvider class which manages account data with local state and backend API integration for a budgeting or expense tracking application. It includes methods for fetching, adding, updating, and removing account records, utilizing an ApiClient for network operations.

classes.name: AccountProvider
classes.description: A ChangeNotifier that manages a list of accounts, with functionalities to fetch from backend, add, update, and remove accounts, updating listeners on state changes.

methods.name: fetchAccounts
methods.description: Fetches account data from backend API and updates local account list, notifying listeners of state changes.

methods.name: addAccount
methods.description: Adds a new account locally with an autogenerated ID and attempts to post it to the backend API, returning the created account or null on failure.

methods.name: updateAccount
methods.description: Updates an existing account locally and attempts to update it on the backend API, returning success status.

methods.name: removeAccount
methods.description: Removes an account locally by ID and attempts to delete it from backend API, returning success status.
